prompts: Create a ghostly Pokemon with a jellyfish-like appearance and shimmering colors.
Imagine a mysterious creature floating above the ground with an ethereal glow.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a mixture of jellyfish and alien life forms.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of both aquatic and cosmic themes.
Generate a unique Pokemon that emanates a sense of otherworldliness and danger.
Make a Pokemon with translucent features and a floating, amorphous body.
Give me a design for a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and is elusive.
